features: Firming Body Lotion: This skin firming butter with Q10 and Vitamin E is formulated to help visibly restore your body, especially after pregnancy or weight loss. This moisturizer is a great tone up cream for all skin types and features a light cocoa scent

Special Formula: Made with Cocoa Butter to naturally moisturize, Raw Shea Butter to provide essential fatty acids and nutrients, Vitamin E to help improve the appearance of scars and stretch marks and Elastin for skin firming and tightening

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Choose What's Real: Our nourishing skin care and hair care products feature real, high-quality, plant-based ingredients. Our product line for whole body care includes body butter, creams, balms, lotions, oils, soaps, pregnancy and stretch mark care

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair
body.description: Your body goes through a lot of big changes during pregnancy. Not only do you have strange cravings and stronger nails and hair due to hormones, but your skin stretches to accommodate your growing little one. Don't despair, though - your post-baby body doesn't have to be a bad thing if you can find the best firming body lotion! Embrace your body after giving birth and treat your skin to the soothing, healing power of natural cocoa butter to reduce the appearance of stretch marks and help conquer skin problems after pregnancy. If you find yourself in search of a skin firming and tightening cream, Palmer's Cocoa Butter Firming Skin Lotion offers a natural and effective solution to a post-natal after-pregnancy belly skin tightening regimen. This unique cocoa butter lotion contains a powerful combination of ingredients including vitamin E, collagen, elastin, ginseng, and Co Q10 to help tighten and tone skin and shea butter to deeply moisturize, creating a rich lotion that hydrates your postpartum body and nourishes your skin after pregnancy. It's dermatologist-tested, free of harsh chemicals, and helps to restore elasticity while firming and tightening skin after pregnancy. The formula works to smooth your skin while improving your skin's tone and texture; perfect for your post-baby body!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: REAL INGREDIENTS At Palmer's, we believe that natural is beautiful. That is why we continually strive to use natural, raw ingredients in our products. We are committed to delivering high quality, high performing products while choosing fair trade and organic ingredients whenever possible. With Palmer's products, you can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin. REAL HERITAGE Founded more than 180 years ago as skin care companies, E.T. Browne Drug is in treatment-oriented beauty products with its trusted Palmer’s brand. Palmer's crafts products that are trusted and passed down from generation to generation. Palmer's Choose What's Real is a philosophy that goes into every product we make; real high-quality, natural ingredients in formulas that really work, for real people. REAL SUSTAINABILITY Palmer's uses ethically and sustainably sourced ingredients. As members of the World Cocoa Foundation and Global Shea Alliance, Palmer’s helps empower farmers & communities to create and promote healthy, sustainable production from farm to bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My favorite lotion, hands down. Smells like chocolate, super moisturizing. The bottle seems small though and I go through a bottle so quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST CREAM EVER. But horrible bottle.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using for a year now. I don’t care about the alleged benefits because topical products can only do so much but the ingredients are really good and it is so thick in the most luxurious way, but it does not leave your skin greasy. It also smells like chocolate. The downside is that you have to cut every bottle because a an entire 1/4 of the product will get stuck in the bottle and that is a lot of product. Way too much to let go to waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Sooo smooth on my skin. Definitely will be buying again and again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will Purchase Again
reviews.reviewText: So I've seen this product in the store and what not but I've never tried it. I've lost A LOT of weight and am concerned about the loose skin. My Boyfriend suggested this so I looked at the reviews and saw one lady comment about using this along with derma rolling. So I bought it. It just arrived a few days ago and have used it a few times since then. First impressions: When I saw it come out of the pump it reminded me of a silicone cream, but it goes on MUCH better and smoother than the silicone cream and does not leave the greasy residue. This stuff soaks right in, I almost feel like I need to use a little more during application. My skin feels like silk, doesn't have a residue or weird feel to it. This lotion lasts for a long time too, unlike other lotions where you have to keep re applying it. The scent...for some reason I thought it would smell like sun tan lotion, ya know, beachy... But...it has a slight smell of chocolate...hence the COCOA BUTTER...lol. But it does smell pretty good! My boyfriend doesn't find it overwhelming which is a plus. I will definitely be purchasing this again when this bottle is gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this lotion so much! I am someone who uses lotion constantly. This stuff is so moisturizing. I got it for when my skin was incredibly dry due to pregnancy and it helped so much! I continue to use it now because I loved it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm bad at applying daily (don't even get me started on the recommended twice a day 😹) but I like the smell and it goes on smooth without leaving a sticky layer behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is great, but would have been better if the top would pump out the lotion. It came broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it but makes me want cookies!
reviews.reviewText: This is great cream but the smell is so delicious! That should be good, but it makes me smell like fresh baked cookies. :) I will buy again, of course.
I love this cream. I use it all over right after a shower to keep the moisture in. My skin feels really hydrated and smell great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn't believe that a cream, ler alone a non-expensive cream, could actually benefit the skin on my arms but this definitely has. My skin was looking crepey and ageing. By using this consistently for several weeks, morning and night, there is a definite and observable improvement. I wouldn't stop using it now! Use it liberally and massage in well.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love this lotion -- in fact
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion -- in fact, I'm probably addicted to it. It smells great (kinda like mint chocolate) and although it may or may not be firming my skin, it soaks in quickly and moisturizes well.
Smells sooo good. My skins is so smooth and soft afterwards :)
